arts.ttl: Every word Ange Postecoglou said on Son struggles, Archie Gray, Solanke and Kulusevski decision
arts.sum: Our Spurs correspondent Alasdair Gold was among those putting the questions to Postecoglou after the game and we've got a full transcript below of the press conference within the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. I guess people are looking for easy targets but if people don’t understand what we are dealing with at the moment and how the players are coping with it, I think it’s fairly self evident.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou responds to Tottenham fans boos with defence of 'easy targets'
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur were booed off after failing to beat Fulham on home soil, Marco Silva's men taking a share of the spoils in Sunday's London derby

arts.ttl: Why Tottenham vs Fulham Premier League clash is not on TV in the UK
arts.sum: The reason being is because it was originally scheduled for Saturday before it was moved for a Sunday afternoon kick-off due to Spurs' Europa League commitments. Now they're back in Premier League action, with Tottenham Hotspur Stadium expected to be packed out for the London derby with the Whites.

arts.ttl: Tottenham ready to complete two deals as Ange Postecoglou's January transfer plans take shape
arts.sum: Werner has been in and out of Ange Postecoglou ’s side in the Premier League this season, but provided an assist as a late substitute in the win over Man City. Plans are already being put into place for the January transfer window at Tottenham with Postecoglou revealing that he has held a number of meetings with technical director Johan Lange over the window that opens in a month.

arts.ttl: Cairney rescues a point but gets sent off as Fulham draw at Spurs
arts.sum: Fulham earned a deserved point in a 1-1 draw at Tottenham Hotspur as substitute Tom Cairney scored a second-half equaliser before being sent off late on. Maddison’s free-kick was the closest Spurs came to opening the scoring before Johnson’s strike after the break, with the Welshman's goal coming came against the run of play.
Ange was asked how much the late withdrawal of striker Dominic Solanke to illness impacted his plans... First up, Ange was asked for his thoughts on the game...

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou hails his Tottenham stars for 'not seeking excuses' in 1-1 draw with Fulham amid injury woes - and aims dig at Premier League rivals for 'so much violin playing over one centre-back'
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW AT THE TOTTENHAM HOTSPUR STADIUM: Postecoglou complained about the Premier League's string section after watching Tottenham play second fiddle to Fulham.

arts.ttl: Silva insists Pereira is not finished at Fulham
arts.sum: Fulham reaction. The post Silva insists Pereira is not finished at Fulham appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Fulham 'deserved to win' - Silva reacts to Spurs draw
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva is frustrated that his side could not claim three points after a "great" performance against Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou’s updates on Dominic Solanke, Cristian Romero and Archie Gray
arts.sum: Asked about Archie, Ange said: “He got a knock, a bit of a dead leg, so hopefully nothing too significant.” Speaking on our Review Show, Ange told us: “Dom trained yesterday, but the illness hit him overnight, so we’ll have to see how he recovers.
